headline: Cincinnati Children’s and GE HealthCare build collaborative research program to drive pediatric imaging innovation
summary: CHICAGO, April 10, 2025--Cincinnati Children’s and GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) will form a strategic research program focused on driving clinical and technical research to advance innovation for pediatric care delivery across modalities, including magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), ultrasound, molecular imaging (MI), and computed tomography (CT). The research program will establish the first pediatric Care Innovation Hub nationwide, representing a new model established by GE HealthCare and Cinci

content.title: Cincinnati Children’s and GE HealthCare build collaborative research program to drive pediatric imaging innovation
content.summary: CHICAGO, April 10, 2025--Cincinnati Children’s and GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) will form a strategic research program focused on driving clinical and technical research to advance innovation for pediatric care delivery across modalities, including magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), ultrasound, molecular imaging (MI), and computed tomography (CT). The research program will establish the first pediatric Care Innovation Hub nationwide, representing a new model established by GE HealthCare and Cinci
